org.apache.ctakes.assertion.attributes.features.selection

Class Chi2FeatureSelection<OUTCOME_T>

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.apache.ctakes.assertion.attributes.features.selection.FeatureSelection<OUTCOME_T>
        • org.apache.ctakes.assertion.attributes.features.selection.Chi2FeatureSelection<OUTCOME_T>

  • public class Chi2FeatureSelection<OUTCOME_T>
extends FeatureSelection<OUTCOME_T>
    Selects features via Chi-squared statistics between the features extracted from its sub-extractor and the outcome values they are paired with in classification instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Chi2FeatureSelection.Chi2Scorer<OUTCOME_T>
      Helper class for aggregating and computing mutual Chi2 statistics
